children.functionDescription: Split a str into items by comma

parameters.text: "FPS: " & fps & newline & "CPU: " & left(str(cpuutilisation*100),4) & "%" & newline & "GPU: " & left(str(gpuutilisation*100),4) & "%" & newline & "OBJ: " & objectcount & newline & "Weapon 1: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_1) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_1 & newline & "Weapon 2: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_2) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_2 & newline & "Weapon 3: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_3) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_3 & newline & "Weapon 4: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_4) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_4 & newline & "Magazine: " & Weapon_Player.MagLeft & "/" & Weapon_Player.Magsize & newline & "Light: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Light  & newline & "Medium: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Medium  & newline & "Heavy: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Heavy  & newline & "Shells: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Shell  & newline & "Explosive: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Explosive & newline & "Special: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Special & newline & "Coyote Time: " & Player.Timer.CurrentTime("CoyoteTime") & newline & "Aim Angle: " & round(Player_Aim.Angle) & newline & "Dodge: " & PlayerData.DodgeCooldown - Player.DodgeTimer & "/" & PlayerData.DodgeCooldown & newline & "Money: " & PlayerData.Money

"Name: " & Weapon_Player.Name & newline & "Type:" & Weapon_Player.Type & newline & "Mode:" & Weapon_Player.Mode & newline & "Ammo Type:" & Weapon_Player.AmmoType & newline & "Damage: " & Weapon_Player.Damage & newline & "Interval: " & Weapon_Player.Interval & newline & "Interval Current:" & Weapon_Player.IntervalCurrent & newline & "Knockback:" & Weapon_Player.Knockback & newline & "Spread: " & Weapon_Player.Spread & newline & "Reload:" & Weapon_Player.Reload & newline & "Handling: " & Weapon_Player.Handling & newline & "Penetration:" & Weapon_Player.Penetration & newline & "Shot Count:" & Weapon_Player.ShotCount & newline & "BurstCount: " & Weapon_Player.BurstCount & newline & newline & "Equipment: " & PlayerData.Equipment & newline & "Equipment CD: " & (str(int(Player.Timer.CurrentTime("EquipmentCooldown"))) & "." & zeropad(int(Player.Timer.CurrentTime("EquipmentCooldown")*100)%100,2) & "/" & Equipment_Current.Cooldown) & newline & newline & "Level: " & PlayerData.Level & newline & "Exp: " & PlayerData.Level_XPThisLevel & "/" & PlayerData.Level_XPNeeded & newline &  "Exp Total: " & PlayerData.Level_XPTotal & newline & newline & "HP: " & PlayerData.HP & "/" & PlayerData.MaxHP

"Zombies: " & Zombie.Count & newline & "Run Time: " & director_RunTime & newline & "Difficulty Time: " & director_DifficultyTime & newline & "Difficulty: " & director_Difficulty & newline & "Int Credits: " & director_IntZ_CreditsPerTurn & newline & "Ext Credits Per Turn: " & director_ExtZ_CreditsPerTurn & newline & "Ext Credits: " & director_ExtZ_Credits & newline & "Ext Credits Total: " & director_ExtZ_CreditsTotal
"Zombies: " & Zombie.Count & newline & "Run Time: " & director_RunTime & newline & "Difficulty Time: " & director_DifficultyTime & newline & "Level Difficulty: " & level_Difficulty
